title: #486 I'm Here to Tell You About Mushrooms with Mat Edgar
itunes:title: I'm Here to Tell You About Mushrooms with Mat Edgar
description:
How was your Shroomfets? Mat Edgar came over to talk about his Shroomfest and also all the others we've spent together! It's a good one.

Subscribe to You Be Trippin'! 

Get tickets to see Ari & Big Jay in Las Vegas September 21st - one night only!

 

For more Ari: https://www.arishaffir.com/

For more Mat: https://linktr.ee/matedgar1 

 

The Music:

Woody Smalls - Planet Shrooms

Dave Matthews Band - I did it

Missing Persons - Walking in LA

Stargazer - Siouxsie Sioux and the Banshees

 

Thanks to our sponsors! 

Heach to 3chi.com and use code "Ari" for 5% off

Use code "Ari" at Sheathunderwear.com for 20% off

Go to BetterHelp.com/Ari for 10% off your first month!
